AD_MonitorLeaves.synopsis: Raphael leaves while at the front of Shar Temple, in case he is attacked.
AD_MonitorLeaves.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to the entrance of the mausoleum2. Attack Raphael

AD_MonitorLeaves_0.speaker: Raphael
AD_MonitorLeaves_0.text: You cannot harm me, but you can irritate me. Goodbye.
AD_MonitorLeaves_0.context: NodeContext: mildly irritated, said right before he teleports away
